SEARCH
Package org.eclipse.mcp.experimental.annotated

Annotation Interface MCPAnnotatedResourceTemplateFactory.ResourceTemplate

Enclosing class:
MCPAnnotatedResourceTemplateFactory
@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(TYPE) @Repeatable(ResourceTemplates.class) @Documented public static @interface MCPAnnotatedResourceTemplateFactory.ResourceTemplate

  • Required Element Summary

    Required Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Required Element
    Description
    String
    description
    A description of what this template is for.
    String
    name
    Intended for programmatic or logical use, but used as a display name in past specs or fallback (if title isn't present).
    String
    uriTemplate
    A URI template (according to RFC 6570) that can be used to construct resource URIs.

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    String
    mimeType
    The MIME type for all resources that match this template.
    double
    priority
    Describes how important this data is for operating the server.
    io.modelcontextprotocol.spec.McpSchema.Role[]
    roles
    Describes who the intended customer of this object or data is.
    String
    title
    A human-readable name for the type of resource this template refers to.

  • Element Details

    • uriTemplate

      String uriTemplate
      A URI template (according to RFC 6570) that can be used to construct resource URIs.

    • name

      String name
      Intended for programmatic or logical use, but used as a display name in past specs or fallback (if title isn't present).

    • title

      String title
      A human-readable name for the type of resource this template refers to. This can be used by clients to populate UI elements.
      Default:
      ""

    • description

      String description
      A description of what this template is for. This can be used by clients to improve the LLM's understanding of available resources. It can be thought of like a "hint" to the model.

    • mimeType

      String mimeType
      The MIME type for all resources that match this template. This should only be included if all resources matching this template have the same type.
      Default:
      "text/plain"

    • roles

      io.modelcontextprotocol.spec.McpSchema.Role[] roles
      Describes who the intended customer of this object or data is. It can include multiple entries to indicate content useful for multiple audiences (e.g., `["user", "assistant"]`).
      Default:
      {}

    • priority

      double priority
      Describes how important this data is for operating the server. A value of 1 means "most important," and indicates that the data is effectively required, while 0 means "least important," and indicates that the data is entirely optional.
      Default:
      -1.0
